title: Kitsutsuki Tanteidokoro
alternative_title: Woodpecker Detective's Office, 啄木鳥探偵處
description: A ghost was seen on the 12th floor of the Asakusa Juunikai building. A newspaper article featuring the sighting brought together Takuboku Ishikawa, who runs a private detective agency to support his family, and his assistant Kyosuke Kindaichi to solve the case.
